pages.text: Have you ever wanted the effects of Feverweed or Snowberries but for a longer or stronger effect? Now you can! These brews use Thick Potions as their base, and have the two effects at level II for 30 seconds as the starting potion.
Adding Redstone lowers the effects to level I but increases the duration to 60 seconds.$(br2)Adding Glowstone increases the effects to level III but decreases the duration to 20 seconds.
